    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_108676</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Charged raindrop between charged plastics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Belasteter Regentropfen zwischen belastetem 
Plastik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Goutte de pluie chargée entre les plastiques 
chargés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pingo de chuva carregado entre plásticos 
carregados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raindrop caricato fra la plastica caricata</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρεωμένη σταγόνα βροχής μεταξύ των χρεωμένων 
πλαστικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gota de agua cargada entre los plásticos 
cargados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two pieces of electrically charged plastic and an electrically charged raindrop falling between them.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charge attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charge repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plastic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">raindrop</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Stücke des elektrisch
belasteten Plastiks und elektrisch belasteten des Regentropfens, der 
zwischen sie fällt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre deux morceaux de plastique 
électriquement chargé et d'une goutte de pluie électriquement 
chargée tombant entre eux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra duas partes de plástico 
eletricamente carregado e de um pingo de chuva eletricamente carregado
que cai entre eles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due parti di plastica 
elettricamente caricata e di un raindrop elettricamente caricato che 
cade fra loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο κομμάτια του 
ηλεκτρικά χρεωμένου πλαστικού και μιας ηλεκτρικά χρεωμένης 
σταγόνας βροχής που πέφτει μεταξύ τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos pedazos del plástico 
eléctricamente cargado y de una gota de agua eléctricamente cargada 
que cae entre ellos.</string>
          </description>
